name: esqlate
description: The front page of the Esqlate project

scripts.front-prepare: cd ./node_modules/esqlate-front && bash -c ' [ ! -d node_modules ] && npm install || true ' && npm run-script build-templates
scripts.server-prepare: cd ./node_modules/esqlate-server && bash -c ' [ ! -d node_modules ] && npm install || true '
scripts.front: npm run-script front-prepare && cd ./node_modules/esqlate-front && npm start
scripts.server: npm run-script server-prepare && cd ./node_modules/esqlate-server && npm start
scripts.test: npm run-script front-prepare && npm run-script server-prepare

author: Matt Forrester
